text: Sweden will compete at the 2018 Winter Paralympics in Pyeongchang, South Korea, held between 9–18 March 2018. They send a team of 21 participants in 5 sports. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:95%;" |- ! Medal !Name ! Sport ! Event !
